BOOK A CLASS

Pair programming is the practice of pairing up to work on programming tasks. Usually, most people imagine two developers seated at the same computer, sharing the keyboard. But with the increasing popularity of remote coding platforms, it’s now possible to pair program thousands of miles apart. Both members must verbalize their thought processes for paired programming to be effective. Successful pair programming relies on successful communication as much as programming skill. The premise is that when working on a complex task, “two heads are better than one.”

This is the second item's accordion body. It is hidden by default, until the collapse plugin adds the appropriate classes that we use to style each element. These classes control the overall appearance, as well as the showing and hiding via CSS transitions. You can modify any of this with custom CSS or overriding our default variables. It's also worth noting that just about any HTML can go within the .accordion-body, though the transition does limit overflow.

BOOK A CLASS
The Trainee will receive instructions and clarifications from the Trainer while they work together as programing partners
Most of the driving will be done by the Trainee with the Trainer only jumping in to lead by example and explain the code
Only Fundamental lessons that are necessary to build a solid foundation in coding are available at the moment

This is the first item's accordion body. It is shown by default, until the collapse plugin adds the appropriate classes that we use to style each element. These classes control the overall appearance, as well as the showing and hiding via CSS transitions. You can modify any of this with custom CSS or overriding our default variables. It's also worth noting that just about any HTML can go within the .accordion-body, though the transition does limit overflow.

We will first go over some basic principles in regards to the subject we are covering. This is necessary cover knowledge we will need in the next step.
We will then complete a practical project that utilizes the concepts of the subject matter
We then wind down with a Q&A or practice sub-session.

Based off prior data, the most efficient length of a lesson is ~ 4 hrs. This ensures that the trainee is exposed to the logic flow and pace that is required to be productive.

For pre-existing lessons the cost is $300 USD for a 4 hour class session. For custom lessons, the cost is $400 USD for a 4 hour class session.
